message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm asking for $11,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? I'm confident you'll see the value at that price.
Hello Alice, I've considered your last offer and I'm willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
